name: The Dark blue Crown of Octopus
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very fast.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
